file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 34-61-03-04 - FMS (HONEYWELL) DATA LOADER - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL FMS (HONEYWELL) DATA LOADER - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH FMS HONEYWELL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove and install the Data Loader. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY AIRCRAFT WITH FMS 34-61-03-000-801-A DATA LOADER - REMOVAL HONEYWELL AIRCRAFT WITH FMS 34-61-03-400-801-A DATA LOADER - INSTALLATION HONEYWELL EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 34-61-03 Page 1 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 34-61-03-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH FMS HONEYWELL 2. DATA LOADER - REMOVAL A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to remove the Data Loader. B. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 223 Cockpit internal panels C. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable D. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable E. Consumable Materials Not Applicable F. Expandable Parts Not Applicable G. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task In the cockpit - LH H. Preparation SUBTASK 841-003-A (1) On the circuit breaker panel, open the DATA LOADER (Location tip: DC BUS 1/NAV/ DATA LOADER) circuit breaker and attach a DO-NOT-CLOSE tag to it. I. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-003-A (1) Release the four Dzus fasteners (1) from the unit. (2) Move the unit out of its housing and disconnect the electrical connectors (3). NOTE: Only the DL-1000 model has 2 connectors to be disconnected. The previous models have only one connector. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 34-61-03 Page 2 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH FMS HONEYWELL Data Loader - Removal/Installation (Typical) Figure 401 A 2. DATA LOADER 1 3. ELECTRICAL CONNECTORS 1. DZUS FASTENER (4) DET. A 1 AIRCRAFT WITH DL-1000 DATA LOADER EM145AMM341038B.DGN EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 34-61-03 Page 3 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 34-61-03-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH FMS HONEYWELL 3. DATA LOADER - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to install the Data Loader. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 34-61-00-470-801-A/200 NAVIGATION DATA BASE - LOADING C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 223 Cockpit internal panels D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task In the cockpit - LH I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-003-A (1) Connect the electrical connectors (3). NOTE: Only the DL-1000 model has 2 connectors to be connected. The previous models have only one connector. (2) Move the Data Loader (2) into its housing. (3) Engage the four Dzus fasteners (1) in the unit. J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-003-A (1) On the circuit breaker panel, close the DATA LOADER (Location tip: DC BUS 1/NAV/ DATA LOADER) circuit breaker and remove the DO-NOT-CLOSE tag from it. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 34-61-03 Page 4 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (2) Do the Navigation Database Loading ( AMM TASK 34-61-00-470-801-A/200). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 34-61-03 Page 5 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
